mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(TO_NUMBER(id)),0)+1 from yj_police
insert into yj_police (id,equipment_code,equipment_type,alarm_time,alarm_type,data_resource,prison,eventid) values(#{id},#{equipmentCode},#{equipmentType},#{alarmTime},#{alarmType},#{dataResource},#{prison},#{eventid})
update yj_police set handlefile = #{handlefile} where eventid = #{eventid}
